original_text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples, after that he was risen from the dead.
korean_text: 이것은 예수께서 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나신 후에 세 번째로 제자들에게 나타나신 것이라

sentences.original_text: This is now the third time
that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples
after that he was risen from the dead
